data.actual_result: You can notice that the Profile icon is a bit lighter than other icons like Mark as Read for example
data.expected_result: Icons should have exact same color as each other, it is the case on Dark theme
data.short_description: Profile icon is slightly lighter than the others icons on Light theme
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to Light theme - Long press a DM channel, or a message in chat - Compare the icon of the Profile option with others
